title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions. $$GCF=2\times2\times2$$ $$GCF=8$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$8y$$ and 16 as products of their GCF, 8. $$8y+16$$ $$8y+8\times2$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression. $$8\left(y+2\right)$$
